UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Backbone Cyclization and Dimerization of LL-37-Derived Peptides Enhance Antimicrobial Activity and Proteolytic Stability.
Literature.Author: Gunasekera S, Muhammad T, Strömstedt AA, Rosengren KJ, Göransson U

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=0.625µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=0.625µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=1.25µM),Candida albicans ATCC 90028(MIC=2.5µM)
